topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f3e1b6368720806001b15#post_559f3e1b6368720806001b15
And I can see why you'd get turned off by the sexy bits, but most of the jokes come off from those bits.
I'd recommend the manga cuz it seems they are gonna focus more on the sexy in the anime. Just be warned the manga shows nip slips so but the show has more eye catching jokes.

And as for the posts. We don't ignore your posts, were just saying you get lost in your topics and that's fine. We just want to do the same without a party pooper. 

And look, I'm not even upset about you posting or whatever. I just got pissed you basically blamed me for mainly not liking it. And then you posting my PM here. Cuz like wtf dude.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f41016368727068001af9#post_559f41016368727068001af9
"Rubella, also known as German measles or three-day measles, is an infection caused by the rubella virus. This disease is often mild with half of people not realizing that they are sick." -Wikipedia

I guess I'm not too concerned then. I hope he gets better though.
